familyMemberEthics.description: Merrill Lynch Credit Corporation held two mortgages for Pres. Trump, both of which mature were scheduled to mature in 2019 and were fully satisfied before year-end on 12/31/2017.: 1) In 1994, Pres. Trump incurred a debt of $100,001 - $250,000 with Merrill Lynch Credit Corporation for 1094 S Ocean Blvd - mortgage, at an interest rate of Six month LIBOR + 1.50%. 2) In 1993, Pres. Trump incurred a debt of $50,001 - $100,000 with Merrill Lynch Credit Corporation for 124 Woodbridge Road - mortgage, at an interest rate of Six month LIBOR + 75%.
